category: Election Fair Committee Regulations/Article 7 (Dismissal of members)
contents: Article 7 (Dismissal of members) The chairman may dismiss members of the Fair Election Commission if they fall under any of the following items. Revised 2020. 11. 05., 2022. 5. 10. 1. When a member declares that it is difficult for him/her to perform his or her duties. 2. When there is a case of misconduct related to his or her duties. 3. In cases of neglect of duty, loss of dignity, illness, etc. If it is deemed unsuitable to be a member due to other reasons. 4. If a member does not evade deliberation on his/her own despite any case falling under Article 12 (1).
